Author: bootload
Content: todo lists seem to be the 'hello world' ajax app that everyone has a go at. probably for good reason. it's useful, it's something you probably do anyway and you build it using the tools you have. I remember a joel on software article 'Painless Software Schedules' ~ http://www.joelonsoftware.com/articles/fog0000000245.html pretty much with the same idea but using excel. Mine are 5x9" cards. Not as good, they don't scale & can be torn up.

Author: icky
Content:
Seriously.

The thing you should seek now are better friends, and better ideas. ;-)
